    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    ChangeRequestPriority
    command to change request priority in some queue.
    HttpCommand
    abstract class that represents a command to operate queue Subclasses should implement the execute() method to define specific command behaviors.
    HttpQueue
    The HttpQueue class manages a queue of HTTP requests, it preserves their insertion order, ensures no duplicates and consider request`s priority.
    HttpRequest
    The HttpRequest class manages HTTP request, it contains request`s url, status code, message, priority and order.
    Invoker
    The Commands.Invoker class in Command design pattern It saves some command and executes a command object
    Main
    This class creates instances of Commands.Invoker and Command objects, showcasing how the pattern can be realized.
    ProcessRequest
    command to process request from the queue.
